amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute provides for the abolishment of the Thrift Depositor Protection Board; and transfers oversight responsibility for the Resolution Funding Corporation to the Secretary of the Treasury.
amendment.purpose: The amendment appears as complete new text in the bill as reported.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Banking and Financial Services amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
